Specs:
Source: BD50 @ DDR

Ripper's note:
All has been said about the Blu-ray transfer... Thus I wont say anything else.

Details and depth enhancing extensively done with DDR own designed avisynth function.

And NO !!! I dont use seesaw for detail enhancing since at least 6 months now...
Why ?
Seesaw was not designed for HD resolution and it has a nasty tendency of creating hallo + edge artifact + color banding. And it also denoise uselessly.
Its great for SD but NOT for HD.
